entry.title: yangsnapify/minesweeper-js: A lightweight and easy-to-use Minesweeper game library in JavaScript. Customize the grid size, mine count, and difficulty with minimal setup. Perfect for integrating Minesweeper into your web projects or for building your own game.

entry.title: konhito/Blog_using_hono: A lightweight and blazing-fast personal blog built with Hono, a minimalistic web framework.
